value: Design for a Pendant with Leaf Volutes and Child's Head

label: Description

Sketches for the Judgement of Paris

label: Description
value: From right to left: Athena sitting with her legs only partly visible. Juno standing beside a peacock. Venus and Cupid sitting. Another apparently sleeping figure is present.

value: Giovanni Piancastelli, Rome; 1901: acquired by the Museum

label: Description
